extDescription.message: A wire bundle diameter estimation tool based on 2D circular packing, supporting multiple wire specifications, wrapping layers, visualization and configuration management.

calc_message_no_valid_wires.message: Please enter at least one wire with valid quantity and diameter for calculation.
calc_message_no_valid_wires.description: No valid wire input error message

calc_message_no_valid_results.message: All simulations failed to produce valid results. Please check your inputs or parameters.
calc_message_no_valid_results.description: No valid calculation results error message

calc_message_calculation_error.message: An error occurred during calculation. Please check the console for more information.

calc_message_save_history_error.message: Error saving history record. Local storage may be full or disabled.

history_message_clear_error.message: Error occurred while clearing history records.

history_message_download_not_supported.message: Browser doesn't support direct download. Please copy data manually.

config_simulation_params_params_pi_descr.message: Pi (Ï) for calculations. Keep default unless special needs.

config_simulation_params_params_r2r1_des.message: Container to fill area radius ratio. Affects packing. Default 1.01 is a balance.

config_simulation_params_params_accelera.message: Push-apart force. Higher is faster but less stable. Default 1.7 is a balance.

config_simulation_params_params_weight_f.message: Mass exponent (r^WF). Affects push force between large/small wires. Default 2.0.

config_simulation_params_params_converge.message: Convergence precision. Lower is more precise but slower. Default 0.001 is a balance.

config_simulation_params_params_max_iter.description: Max main loop iterations parameter title

config_simulation_params_params_max_iter.message: Max iterations for main loop. Prevents infinite loops. Default 500.
config_simulation_params_params_max_iter.description: Max main loop iterations parameter description

config_simulation_params_params_max_iter.message: Max iterations per step. Higher is more precise but slower. Default 15.

config_simulation_params_params_containe.message: Container resize step. Higher is faster but less stable. Default 0.05.

config_simulation_params_reset_button_ti.message: Restore this parameter to default value

config_simulation_params_message_confirm.message: Restore all simulation parameters to defaults? This is irreversible.

config_simulation_params_message_restore.message: Simulation parameters restored to default values!

calc_result_details_header_param.description: Header for parameter column in calculation details table

calc_result_details_header_bare.description: Header for bare wire value column in calculation details table

calc_result_details_header_simulated.description: Header for simulated value column in calculation details table

calc_result_details_label_min.description: Label for minimum diameter row in calculation details table

calc_result_details_label_max.description: Label for maximum diameter row in calculation details table

calc_result_details_label_avg.description: Label for average diameter row in calculation details table

calc_result_details_tooltip_theoretical.message: Theoretical diameter based only on wire stacking simulation (excluding wrapping and tolerance)
calc_result_details_tooltip_theoretical.description: Tooltip for the theoretical diameter value

calc_result_details_tooltip_final.message: Final calculated diameter including wrapping thickness and manufacturing tolerance
calc_result_details_tooltip_final.description: Tooltip for the final calculated diameter value

calc_results_chart_title.description: Title for the calculation results chart section

calc_bottom_bar_save_history.description: Label for the save history checkbox

calc_bottom_bar_save_history_tooltip.message: If checked, each calculation result will be automatically saved to the history
calc_bottom_bar_save_history_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the save history checkbox

calc_bottom_bar_reset_all.description: Text for the reset all button

calc_bottom_bar_reset_all_tooltip.message: Reset all input fields on the page to their default values
calc_bottom_bar_reset_all_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the reset all button

calc_bottom_bar_calculate_tooltip.message: Perform simulation calculation based on current input and display results (or press Enter)

calc_bottom_bar_calculating.description: Text for the calculate button when calculation is in progress

calc_confirm_reset_all.message: Are you sure you want to reset all inputs?
calc_confirm_reset_all.description: Confirmation message when resetting all inputs

calc_result_highlight_tooltip.message: Final average diameter rounded up, with the actual calculated value (including wrapping and tolerance) in parentheses (to 2 decimal places)
calc_result_highlight_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the highlighted average diameter result

calc_result_error.description: Text to display when a calculation error occurs

config_standard_wires_message_saved.description: Success message after saving custom wire configuration.

config_standard_wires_message_restore_fa.message: Failed to restore default configuration. Please check the browser console.\n{error}
config_standard_wires_message_restore_fa.description: Error message when restoring default wire configuration fails.

config_standard_wires_message_duplicate_.message: Error: Duplicate gauge values detected. Please correct the highlighted fields before saving.
config_standard_wires_message_duplicate_.description: Error message for duplicate gauge values.

config_standard_wires_message_confirm_sa.message: All previously entered gauges were empty or invalid and have been removed. The list will be empty after saving. Continue?
config_standard_wires_message_confirm_sa.description: Confirmation message when saving an empty list of custom wires.

config_standard_wires_message_save_cance.message: Save operation cancelled. Your input (including invalid rows) has been retained for editing.
config_standard_wires_message_save_cance.description: Message indicating that the save operation was cancelled.

config_standard_wires_message_internal_e.message: Internal error or concurrent modification: Gauge {gauge} is still duplicated in the final data to be saved. Please refresh the page or try again.
config_standard_wires_message_internal_e.description: Error message for an internal error during save.

config_standard_wires_message_confirm_re.message: Restore standard wires to factory defaults? All custom wires will be lost.
config_standard_wires_message_confirm_re.description: Confirmation message for restoring default wire configurations.

config_standard_wires_message_save_fail.message: Failed to save configuration. Please check the browser console.\n{error}
config_standard_wires_message_save_fail.description: Error message when saving the wire configuration fails.

config_standard_wires_message_invalid_od.message: Error: Row {index} (Gauge {gauge}) has an invalid or negative OD value for {type}.
config_standard_wires_message_invalid_od.description: Error message for an invalid OD value in the custom wires table.

config_import_invalid_format.description: Error message for invalid configuration file format during import

config_import_error.description: Error message for configuration import failure

config_export_error.description: Error message for configuration export failure

history_csv_header_time.description: CSV header for calculation time column.

history_csv_header_standard_wires.description: CSV header for standard wires column.

history_csv_header_special_wires.description: CSV header for special wires column.

history_csv_header_max_theoretical.description: CSV header for max theoretical diameter column.

history_csv_header_min_theoretical.description: CSV header for min theoretical diameter column.

history_csv_header_avg_theoretical.description: CSV header for avg theoretical diameter column.

history_csv_header_final_diameter.description: CSV header for final average diameter column.

history_confirm_clear.message: Are you sure you want to clear all history? This action cannot be undone.

calc_group_standard_wire_button_add_tool.message: Add a new row for standard wire input
calc_group_standard_wire_button_add_tool.description: Tooltip for the add standard wire button

calc_group_standard_wire_button_reset_to.message: Reset the standard wires table to default values
calc_group_standard_wire_button_reset_to.description: Tooltip for the reset standard wires button

calc_group_special_wire_button_add_toolt.message: Add a new row for special wire input
calc_group_special_wire_button_add_toolt.description: Tooltip for the add special wire button

calc_group_special_wire_button_reset_too.message: Reset the special wires table to default values
calc_group_special_wire_button_reset_too.description: Tooltip for the reset special wires button

calc_group_wrap_button_add_tooltip.message: Add a new layer of wrapping
calc_group_wrap_button_add_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the add wrapping button

calc_group_wrap_button_reset_tooltip.message: Reset the wrapping table to default values
calc_group_wrap_button_reset_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the reset wrapping button

calc_group_tolerance_button_reset_toolti.message: Reset manufacturing tolerance to default value (110%)
calc_group_tolerance_button_reset_toolti.description: Tooltip for the reset tolerance button

calc_group_score_button_reset_tooltip.message: Reset calculation quantity to default value (10)
calc_group_score_button_reset_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the reset calculation quantity button

calc_input_tooltip_tolerance_range.message: Drag to adjust manufacturing tolerance percentage (100%-200%)
calc_input_tooltip_tolerance_range.description: Tooltip for the tolerance range slider

calc_input_tooltip_tolerance_input.description: Tooltip for the tolerance text input

calc_input_tooltip_score_range.description: Tooltip for the simulation quantity range slider

calc_input_tooltip_score_input.description: Tooltip for the simulation quantity text input

calc_input_placeholder_qty.description: Placeholder text for quantity field in input boxes

calc_input_placeholder_od.description: Placeholder text for diameter field in input boxes

calc_input_placeholder_thick.description: Placeholder text for thickness field in input boxes

config_input_placeholder_gauge.description: Placeholder text for gauge input in configuration page

config_input_placeholder_thin.description: Placeholder text for Thin value input in configuration page

config_input_placeholder_thick.description: Placeholder text for Thick value input in configuration page

config_input_placeholder_ultrathin.description: Placeholder text for UltraThin value input in configuration page
